TopicTitle: Selecting mirrored parts individually for action groups

Articles.Content:
It is possible to select parts individually which have been placed in mirroring mode for action groups?

example: I have a vessel with engines facing four different directions all placed using mirroring mode. Can I activate each separately using action groups?

Edited November 10, 2015 by Nathanjames

Not in stock. Various mods, such as AGX (Action Groups Extended) will let you follow or ignore symmetry but generally, if you placed something with symmetry it'll stick with symmetric operation.

If you don't want to use a mod then place the parts individually.
